data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Khaustov, Alexander A., Tolstikov, Andrei V. (2014): A new species and new records of the genus Eustigmaeus (Acari: Prostigmata: Stigmaeidae) from Western Siberia. Zootaxa 3861 (6): 531-553, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3861.6.2
